title: Modifiers and arrows on home row

rules.description: Change A/S/D/F/spacebar to ⇧/⌃/⌥/⌘/fn when press two or more keys simultaneously

manipulators.description: spacebar + a + s + d + f -> left_control + left_option + left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + a + s + d -> left_control + left_option + fn + left_shift
spacebar + a + s + f -> left_control + left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + a + d + f -> left_option + left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + s + d + f -> left_option + left_command + fn + left_control
a + s + d + f -> left_control + left_option + left_command + left_shift
spacebar + a + s -> left_control + fn + left_shift
spacebar + a + d -> left_option + fn + left_shift
spacebar + a + f -> left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + s + d -> left_option + fn + left_control
spacebar + s + f -> left_command + fn + left_control
spacebar + d + f -> left_command + fn + left_option
a + s + d -> left_control + left_option + left_shift
a + s + f -> left_control + left_command + left_shift
a + d + f -> left_option + left_command + left_shift
s + d + f -> left_option + left_command + left_control

rules.description: Change S + C to "⌃", D + C to "⌥", and spacebar + G to "fn" when press the key pair simultaneously
Change spacebar/J/K/L/; to fn/⌘/⌥/⌃/⇧ when press two or more keys simultaneously

manipulators.description: spacebar + semicolon + l + k + j -> left_control + left_option + left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + semicolon + l + k -> left_control + left_option + fn + left_shift
spacebar + semicolon + l + j -> left_control + left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + semicolon + k + j -> left_option + left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + l + k + j -> left_option + left_command + fn + left_control
semicolon + l + k + j -> left_control + left_option + left_command + left_shift
spacebar + semicolon + l -> left_control + fn + left_shift
spacebar + semicolon + k -> left_option + fn + left_shift
spacebar + semicolon + j -> left_command + fn + left_shift
spacebar + l + k -> left_option + fn + left_control
spacebar + l + j -> left_command + fn + left_control
spacebar + k + j -> left_command + fn + left_option
semicolon + l + k -> left_control + left_option + left_shift
semicolon + l + j -> left_control + left_command + left_shift
semicolon + k + j -> left_option + left_command + left_shift
l + k + j -> left_option + left_command + left_control

rules.description: Change K + M to "⌥", L + M to "⌃", and spacebar + H to "fn" when press the key pair simultaneously
